body.p: Power to the load will be provided by the Bypass, which has two power sources, the RPP and reserve power. The power output cables from the RPP to the load must be disconnected at the RPP and re-cabled to the Bypass Cabinet.
The following illustration shows the one-line diagram for the Retrofit Bypass Cabinet. The one-line diagram is the same for LH and RH orientations.

li.p: A licensed electrician must install the Retrofit Bypass Cabinet and connect internal and external wiring.
Installers should use Lock-Out/Tag-Out procedures and observe other precautions listed in the introductory Safety section.
Power wiring and grounding must comply with NEC and applicable local codes.
